name: vrview
description: Embed VR content into your webpage.

scripts.build-min: browserify src/embed/main.js | derequire | uglifyjs -c > build/embed.min.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-dev: browserify src/embed/main.js | derequire > build/embed.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-analytics-min: browserify src/embed/with-analytics.js | derequire | uglifyjs -c > build/embed.min.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-analytics-dev: browserify src/embed/with-analytics.js | derequire > build/embed.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-api-min: browserify --standalone VRView src/api/main.js | derequire | uglifyjs -c > build/vrview.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-min & npm run build-dev & npm run build-api
scripts.build-analytics: npm run build-analytics-min & npm run build-analytics-dev & npm run build-api
scripts.build-api: npm run build-api-min & npm run build-api-dev
scripts.build-three-closure: rollup -c src/third_party/three/rollup.config.js && java -jar src/third_party/three/closure-compiler-v20201102.jar --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs src/third_party/three/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --js build/three.js --js_output_file build/three.min.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-analytics & npm run build-three-closure & npm run build-dms
